name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstaSearch: Instagram captions search for posts and reels

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstaSearch is a browser extension that allows you to search and scroll through Instagram posts and reels using their captions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaSearch: Find Instagram Posts/Reel by Caption 🔍

Quickly search Instagram captions to find specific posts and reels on any profile. Save time and rediscover content easily. ⏱️✨

Key Features:

🔤 Search captions on any Instagram profile
🔎 Find posts using keywords

How to Use:

👤 Visit an Instagram profile
⌨️ Type keywords in the search bar
👀 View matching posts and reels

Perfect for:

🎨 Content creators
📊 Marketers
📸 Instagram enthusiasts

🔒 Privacy-focused: Works in your browser, no data collection.

Transform how you use Instagram - find what you need instantly! 🚀
